desc: After a client has been registered and activated, an email must be sent to the 	administrator (Role set as Company Admin and Administrator) advising them 	of successful registration and activation. A PDF help manual must be attached 	as well which we can add as a hyperlink on the email as sent out. This will 	access the same location (FTP) at all times where the document can be 	updated if required (maintaining the same file naming convention).
name: CC - EH_5 (9) - Activation
